update_content.message: You can download wallpaper with the bottom-right button.

extension_desc.message: Simple new tab with beautiful bing.com daily wallpaper.

op_search_prompt.message: Edit JSON config to adjust search engines. You can change the order / delete or add search engines.

op_quick_link_prompt.message: Customize the Quick Links to be displayed in the upper right.

op_custom_bkmk_prompt.message: Edit JSON to add links you want to display:

op_about_prompt.message: WallPaper - Refreshing and surprising new tab experience.

op_saved_alert.message: Changes have been saved and will take effect when opening a new tab.

op_reset_default_confirm_alert.message: Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration?

op_reset_default_done_alert.message: Restored to default configuration. It will take effect when opening a new tab.

op_top_site_require_perm.message: Turning on this feature requires you to grant permission to read the list of most visited sites.

op_top_site_perm_fail.message: Authorization failed, feature cannot be turned on. Please try again and grant the permission.
